name: Goolean
description: Goolean is a boolean model search engine that allows users to perform boolean queries on a dataset of documents (corpus)

name: Goolean-web
description: Goolean-web is a web application that provides a web interface for the `Goolean` search engine

name: gshell
description: A simple, general-purpose command-line interface (CLI) shell embedded in the Goolean search engine.

name: cp-library
description: A library of data structures and algorithms for competitive programming, implemented in C++ and documented in LaTeX.

name: CPU-Scheduling-Simulator
description: A CPU scheduling simulator that simulates various CPU scheduling algorithms.

name: CPriorityQueue
description: A generic Priority Queue implementation in C using generic pointers (void pointers) and compare functions, supporting various C primitive data types.

name: Distributed-File-Sharing-System
description: This project tries to mimic a Distributed File Sharing System with Flooding technique using Sockets in Java.

name: Count-Min Sketch
description: Count-Min Sketch Data Structure written in JavaScript and tested using Jasmine framework

name: ImageExtensionDetector
description: A simple image extension detector tool that reads the file header and detect its type written in C++.

name: MiniGamesVsAi
description: A collection of mini games with basic AI algorithms.

name: Turing-Machine-Simulator
description: A Turing Machine Simulator that simulates a Turing machine with a given set of states, input tape, and transition function.
